short_description: Exports input data required by [the vanilla version of CARNIVAL](https://saezlab.github.io/CARNIVAL/) (sif file, measurements and perturbations) into a HDF5 file required by the optimised version of CARNIVAL with the parallel ACO C++ solver.
long_description: Exports input data required by [the vanilla version of CARNIVAL](https://saezlab.github.io/CARNIVAL/) (sif file, measurements and perturbations) into a HDF5 file required by the optimised version of CARNIVAL with the parallel ACO C++ solver.

default.name: sif
default.description: The sif csv file containing the signaling network

default.name: measurements
default.description: The measurements csv with the TFs and weights

default.name: inputs
default.description: The csv file with the input protein targets
